name: ArtToday
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art today
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you enjoy art? We do and we would like to share that enjoyment with you.

This skill utilizes Microsoft Azure's Cognitive Services to compare historical events from today's date to the vast collection of art found in the open dataset of the New York Metropolitan Art Museum - the largest and most visited art museum in the United States. We hope you enjoy Art Today.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
